Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Teresa's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: Teresa is among the undead Meridian residents found wandering the woods near their former home. Elijah begins to tear up at the sight of the young woman shambling in the woods and Maggie explains to Negan and Gabriel that Teresa was Elijah's sister 's best friend. She is put down and given a proper burial.
Death[]: Killed By The Reapers (Alive) During the attack on Meridian , Teresa is killed by the Reapers. Maggie Rhee (Zombified) Maggie stabs a zombified Teresa in the head.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Teresa has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Trivia[]: Teresa's walker can be seen moving on the ground after having been put down.
